exec: // To make an signed document some vars needs to be excluded from your signature.
// To make an signed request the field '_signature' needs to be sent inside of URL.
// To make an signed document some vars needs to be excluded from your signature.

content_signature = "unique_name=" + request.data.unique_name + "&buy_start=" + request.data.buy_start + "&buy_end=" + request.data.buy_end + "&sell_start=" + request.data.sell_start + "&sell_end=" + request.data.sell_end
content_signature = "name=" + request.data.name + "&days=" + request.data.days + "&apiKey=" + request.data.apiKey + "&amount=" + request.data.amount + "&symbol=" + request.data.symbol

content_signature = "exchange=" + request.data.exchange + "&symbol=" + request.data.symbol + "&currency=" + request.data.currency + "&days=" + request.data.days + "&dateStart=" + request.data.dateStart;
